correct_order: There are more than 100 schools in the country.
Do not ever choose a school without going to the place and having a look. You should go and see once you have a chance.
You can see the facilities and accommodations around the school.
Because you might be living there.
And they can be helpful to your study as well.

sources: You can see the facilities and accommodations around the school.
